name: Lolly Joe
description:
A dog's journey to reunite with his best friend. Lolly Joe is a 3D-platforming adventure that takes you through the surreal worlds inside a boy's subconscious mind. With his magic lollipop, Joe must overcome a variety of challenges crafted from his friend's dreams and memories.

  • Explore vibrant, cartoon worlds inhabited by funny and strange creatures
  • Challenging gameplay that put your platforming skills to the test
  • An emotional story inspired by real world events
  • Unlock 27 costumes and accessories to customize Joe's appearance in amusing ways
  • Unique experience every time you play, with platforming challenges randomly varying on every run
  • Fully playable with any Xinput-based game controller
